TopicTitle: Kopernicus fails to load with galaxies unbound

Articles.Content:
So far ive tried reinstalling it but to no avail with and without other mods, ive tried verifying game (also hasnt worked) even a fresh install... im kinda at a loss here :\
the kopernicus log outputs the exact same error no matter what if i delete the system pack its apart of it just does it to the next one
